entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as having spent the morning emptying his school trunk.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is also a student at Hogwarts. Harry makes a mental note to ask her how something was done.

entities.name: harry's school trunk
entities.description: Harry's luggage that he has been carrying with him since the start of his six years at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Harry makes a mental note to ask Hermione how something was done, indicating that he needs her help or expertise.
Harry is described as emptying his school trunk, indicating that it belongs to him.
